trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Expõe e atualiza as informações de usuário associado armazenadas em um armazenamento de dados do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto é usado para representar um usuário da associação único no repositório de dados de associação do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: Ele exibe informações sobre o usuário de associação, como o endereço de email e fornece funcionalidade para o usuário de associação, como a capacidade de alterar ou redefinir sua senha.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto é retornado pelo provedor de associação do aplicativo sempre que o aplicativo está configurado para usar um repositório de dados do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: Em um aplicativo que pode ser configurado usar dados diferentes armazena ou em um aplicativo que usa vários repositórios de dados, você pode se referir à classe base, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto não implementa o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> propriedades, você deve estar preparado para lidar com o <xref:System.NotSupportedException> que é lançada quando esses membros são acessados em uma <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> classe implementa otimizações internas usadas pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> classe para minimizar o número de atualizações de atributo que ocorrem ao chamar o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Também serializar o <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representação (disponível no <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> propriedade) para que uma <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto pode ser serializado e desserializado sem gerar exceções.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> retornado pelo objeto de <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> métodos ou como parte de um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> retornado pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto é necessário para o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> método quando você deseja atualizar as informações para um usuário de associação existente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> propriedades são mapeadas para atributos do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte tabela lista o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> mapeamentos de atributo de propriedades e padrão.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Default directory attribute
trans-unit.target: Atributo de diretório padrão

trans-unit.source: Can be mapped?
trans-unit.target: Pode ser mapeado?

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: Não

trans-unit.source: Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName
trans-unit.target: Sim, mas deve ser userPrincipalName ou sAMAccountName

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: Não

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: Não

trans-unit.source: Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.
trans-unit.target: Sim, mas deve ser um atributo de valor único do tipo cadeia de caracteres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: n/a
trans-unit.target: N/D

trans-unit.source: Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Não há suportada por <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.

trans-unit.source: n/a
trans-unit.target: N/D

trans-unit.source: Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Não há suportada por <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: Não

trans-unit.source: none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum, mas deve ser mapeada para um atributo se usando perguntas e respostas segurança para redefinição de senha ou recuperação.

trans-unit.source: Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.
trans-unit.target: Sim, mas deve ser um atributo de valor único do tipo cadeia de caracteres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: `User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: `User-Account-Control` (AD)

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: Não

trans-unit.source: computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: calculado a partir `lockoutTime` e a duração do bloqueio de AD (anúncio no Windows 2000)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD no Windows Server 2003)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: Não

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se bloqueada devido a muitas tentativas de senha incorreta, o atributo de tempo de bloqueio é retornado.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se bloqueada devido a resposta de senha incorreta muitas tentativas, o valor armazenado no atributo definido pelo `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` será retornado.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se bloqueada devido a uma senha incorreta e a senha incorreta muitas tentativas, será retornado o valor de data/hora mais recente.

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Se a conta não está bloqueada, retorne 1/1/1753 para compatibilidade do SQL.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: Não

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using properties on the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object on a Web page that may return user information from multiple membership data stores.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso de propriedades sobre o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto em uma página da Web que podem retornar informações de usuário de vários armazenamentos de dados de associação.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object that underlies the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> object returned by the membership provider does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, the code first checks the type of the user object returned from the membership provider before displaying the contents of those properties.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto que dá suporte a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> retornado pelo provedor de associação de objeto não implementa o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> propriedades, o código primeiro verifica o tipo do objeto de usuário retornado da associação provedor antes de exibir o conteúdo dessas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> object for a class that inherits the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> para uma classe que herda a classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.%23ctor%2A> construtor não se destina a ser usado em seu código.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email" /> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O endereço <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved" /> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut" /> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro não é usado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro não é usado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate" /> do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> com os valores de propriedade especificados.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Criando um novo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto não adiciona um novo objeto de usuário de associação para o repositório de dados de associação.

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um novo usuário associado ao repositório de associação de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto do usuário da associação adicionado ao repositório de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objetos geralmente são construídos em código do aplicativo para uso com o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> método, embora você também pode passar um <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto retornado do <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> método para o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> método também.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objetos normalmente são construídos por implementações do provedor de associação para o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="providerUserKey" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="providerUserKey" /> não é um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="providerName" /> is <see langword="null" /> and a provider is not set in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="providerName" /> é <see langword="null" /> e um provedor não está definido no arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define informações específicas do aplicativo para o usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <see langword="Comment" /> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Informações específicas do aplicativo para o membro do Active Directory armazenado no <see langword="Comment" /> atributo de diretório.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A> property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A> propriedade pode ser usada para armazenar informações personalizadas para um usuário de associação que é específica para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de informações que podem ser armazenadas no `Comment` propriedade para um <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> é definido pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A> property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A> propriedade está mapeada para o `Comment` atributo do padrão do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser remapeada para outro atributo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the email address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o endereço de email do usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The email address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O endereço de email do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A> property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A> propriedade está mapeada para o `Mail` atributo de diretório.

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser remapeada no arquivo Web. config, definindo o `attributeMapUserName` atributo o [provedores de elemento para o perfil (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) elemento para perfis.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o usuário associado pode ser autenticado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o usuário pode ser autenticado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> valor para um usuário de associação é verificado durante a chamada para <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> propriedade retorna `false`, o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> método retorna `false` mesmo se o nome de usuário fornecido e a senha estão corretos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> propriedade está mapeada para um dos seguintes atributos do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Application Mode
trans-unit.target: Modo de aplicativo do Active Directory

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser remapeada para outro atributo.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: Gera uma exceção <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> em todos os casos

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> exception.
trans-unit.target: Sempre lança uma exceção <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> propriedade não é suportada pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> classe.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de obter ou definir o valor sempre fará um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether the underlying type of a membership user is <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>, and to avoid throwing a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> for accessing the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como determinar se o tipo subjacente de um usuário de associação é <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>e para evitar que seja um <xref:System.NotSupportedException> para acessar o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para o necessário para executar o exemplo de código completo, consulte a seção exemplo de <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> tópico de visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: qualquer tentativa de obter ou definir a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate" />.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Gera uma exceção <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> exception.
trans-unit.target: Sempre lança uma exceção <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> propriedade não é suportada pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> classe.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de obter ou definir o valor sempre fará um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether the underlying type of a membership user is <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>, and to avoid throwing a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> for accessing the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como determinar se o tipo subjacente de um usuário de associação é <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>e para evitar que seja um <xref:System.NotSupportedException> para acessar o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para o necessário para executar o exemplo de código completo, consulte a seção exemplo de <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> tópico de visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: qualquer tentativa de obter ou definir a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador de usuário do armazenamento de dados do Active Directory para o usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Armazenar o identificador do usuário de dados do Active Directory para o usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> propriedade expõe o identificador da associação de fonte de dados genericamente digitada como um `object`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> classe pode ser convertida como um <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format by converting it to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo exibe o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> propriedade no formato de linguagem de definição do descritor de segurança (SDDL), convertendo-o para um <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para o necessário para executar o exemplo de código completo, consulte a seção exemplo de <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> tópico de visão geral da classe.
